title: The Energetic Shadow: The Tale of Ivan Scott
summary: Ivan Scott, a dance-loving guide by day, discovers his shadow-dancing superpower, using it to protect his city from an ancient threat over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Ivan Scott, tagsüber ein tanzliebender Führer, entdeckt seine Schatten-Tanz-Superkraft und verwendet sie, um seine Stadt im Laufe einer Woche vor einer alten Bedrohung zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Ivan Scott, overdag een dansliefhebbende gids, ontdekt zijn schaduwdans superkracht, waarmee hij zijn stad beschermt tegen een oude dreiging gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Ivan Scott, un guide amateur de danse le jour, découvre son super-pouvoir de danse d'ombre, l'utilisant pour protéger sa ville contre une menace ancienne au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Ivan Scott starts his week feeling energetic as he leads a group of tourists through the city. While dancing at sunset, an ancient artifact reveals itself, granting him the power to manipulate shadows.
Ivan experiments with his new powers, learning to make his shadow perform independent actions. He helps prevent a small theft by controlling it to scare off a thief.
Minor disturbances plague the city. Ivan uses his powers under cover of the night, becoming a mysterious savior, slowly gaining media attention.
The source of the disturbances—a forgotten underworld deity—emerges, seeking the artifact. Ivan feels overwhelmed but determined.
Ivan coordinates with local authorities for the first time, winning their trust as he expertly guides them through evacuation plans while his shadow battles the deity’s minions.
The confrontation peaks. With the city’s support, Ivan channels the power of every shadow in the city, leading to a massive showdown at dawn.
The deity is finally banished, and peace is restored. Ivan is celebrated as a hero. He spends his evening dancing, his shadow matching every move in perfect harmony.

ending: As Ivan danced into the night, the city’s shadows danced along, a silent testament to his new role as its guardian.
moral: Even those who lead the most ordinary lives can become extraordinary heroes when the moment demands it.
